警告: 以下高级设置可能影响系统稳定性或功能!: Warning: The following advanced settings may affect system stability or functionality!
修改 PlatformAoAcOverride 注册表值可能禁用现代待机功能，\:
Modifying the PlatformAoAcOverride registry value may disable Modern Standby,
causing the sleep option to disappear, but may solve some power plan issues.
功能:\n• 快速切换电源计划（节能、平衡、高性能、卓越性能）\n• 查看和管理:
Features:
• Quickly switch power plans (Power Saver, Balanced, High Performance, Ultimate Performance)
• View and manage all power plans
• Modify advanced power-related registry settings
• Run custom PowerShell commands
注意:\n• 某些操作需要管理员权限\n• 修改注册表设置可能导致系统不稳定\n:
Note:
• Some actions require administrator privileges
• Modifying registry settings may cause system instability
• Deleting power plans is irreversible
